bibl.title: Two New Latin Papyri from the Tebtynis Temple Library
bibl.seg: 141.5 P. Berol. Inv. 14470b + P. Carlsberg 671 + P.S.I. Inv. I 149 recto P. Carlsberg 555 + P.S.I. Inv. D 111 recto
Hilla Halla-aho, Two New Latin Papyri from the Tebtynis Temple Library.

The only Latin texts from the Tebtynis temple library. Second century. - 1. P. Carlsberg 671 recto + Berlin P 14470b recto + PSI inv. I 149 recto. Fragments, including a Roman will (testamentum per aes et libram) [P. Carlsberg 671 A + C + Berlin P 14470 b]. - 2. P. Carlsberg 555 + PSI Inv. D 111 recto. A military document mentioning ships, canoes and iron smiths.
